item.title: Deutsche Bank lays out 4 reasons why Tesla is rallying despite those terrible results
item.description: "Deliveries and sentiment could potentially be bottoming together," analyst Edison Yu wrote in a note to clients.

item.title: Third Point's Dan Loeb says he's sold out of nearly all of his 'Magnificent 7' holdings
item.description: "We sold out of our Mag 7 holdings. Early on we got out of Meta, and reduced our Amazon. We got out of basically all of them," Dan Loeb said.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says this language learning stock can surge almost 30%
item.description: The firm began research coverage of Duolingo with an initial investment rating of overweight.

item.title: Gold miners are looking cheap here with the commodity at all-time highs, chart analysts say
item.description: Technical analysts are noting gold miners can play catch up to the commodity, and have further upside.

item.title: Here are Wednesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Cava, Toast, Roblox, Coinbase, Duolingo & more
item.description: Here are Wednesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.
